    • Uses of RemoteObserver in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client

      Subinterfaces of RemoteObserver in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ServerConnection
      Describes a connection the client has with the server, regardless of the connection method
      Classes in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client that implement RemoteObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClientView
      A class representing the view implemented by a client, extending the RemoteObservable abstract class to notify listeners about a ViewEvent generated by the user.
      class  RMIServerConnection
      Represents a connection to the server implemented by using Java's Remote Method Invocation (RMI).
      class  SocketServerConnection
      Represents a connection to the server implemented by using TCP sockets.
      Methods in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client with parameters of type RemoteObserver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ServerConnection.addObserver(RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
      Adds an observer to listen for updates
      void ServerConnection.removeObserver(RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate> observer)
      Removes an observer from listening for updates If it hasn't previously subscribed, does nothing

      Methods in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer with parameters of type RemoteObserver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RemoteObservable.addObserver(RemoteObserver<T> observer)
      Subscribes given observer for events.
      void RemoteRoutingObservable.addObserver(String username, RemoteObserver<T> observer)
      Subscribe given observer to all events addressed to the specified username.
      void RemoteObservable.removeObserver(RemoteObserver<T> observer)
      Unsubscribe observer for events.
      void RemoteRoutingObservable.removeObserver(String username, RemoteObserver observer)
      Unsubscribe given observer from events addressed to given username.

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Controller
      Represents the Controller of the MVC pattern.
      interface  PersistentView
      Represents an extension of the View of a player, which is used by the controller.
      Classes in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller that implement RemoteObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ControllerImpl
      Implementation of the Controller, which uses PersistentViews to decorate the player's views.
      class  PersistentViewImpl
      Implementation of PersistentView by decorating RemoteView Uses a RequestManager to handle requests to the user and a ScheduledExecutorService for the timer.
